1_12mXeWWrpRSTvSc2ofvfgsgsNgDfR5obAZ.body: I do not like gnome despite that i had many different linux distros installed on my laptop from which some have option of using gnome (Slackware, fedora, debian, ubuntu, kali linux and some more). My preference is in xfce, lxqt, lxde.

1_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz.body: I have tried many linux distros throughout the years. I like debian for it's deb package system but i do not like that the versions of packages are to old and this is why i like more some debian based distros like for example kali linux. What i would like to try at one point in time is Arch Linux.
